name: Apple iPhone 16
description: The Apple iPhone 16 is a high-end smartphone with a large display, powerful A16 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G connectivity, and a triple-camera setup with ProRAW and ProRes video recording capabilities.

name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is a high-end Android smartphone with a large display, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a quad-camera setup with 108MP main sensor.

name: Samsung S22 Ultra
description: The Samsung S22 Ultra is a premium smartphone with a large display, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a quad-camera setup with 108MP main sensor.

name: Google Pixel 9 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 9 Pro is a flagship smartphone with a large display, powerful Tensor G3 chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.7-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, and a triple-camera setup with advanced computational photography features.

name: Apple MacBook Pro (M1)
description: The Apple MacBook Pro (M1) is a high-performance laptop powered by Apple's M1 chip. It features a Retina display, long battery life, and advanced graphics capabilities, making it ideal for creative professionals and power users.

name: Monolith Tablet
description: The Tablet is a versatile device with a large touchscreen display, powerful processor, and support for various apps and accessories. It is ideal for browsing, streaming, and productivity tasks.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 15 Ultral
description: The Xiaomi Redmi 13 is a budget-friendly smartphone with a large display, decent performance, and a good camera system. It features a 6.5-inch IPS LCD display, 4G connectivity, and a dual-camera setup.

name: Infinix Zero 30
description: The Infinix Zero 30 is a mid-range smartphone with a large display, decent performance, and a good camera system. It features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a triple-camera setup.

name: Samsung Galaxy
description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 is a high-performance tablet with a large display, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, and support for the S Pen. It is ideal for productivity and entertainment tasks.
